name: EA SPORTS
description: Download the EA SPORTS App to sign up for EA SPORTS Season Ticket and get access to amazing member benefits across Madden NFL, NHL®, FIFA, Tiger Woods PGA TOUR®, and NCAA Football®, plus other great features!  Subscribing to EA SPORTS Season Ticket  to get:  • Access to over 8000 Microsoft® Points worth of PDLC • 3 Day Early Access to all participating franchises • Get 20% off additional PDLC in all participating franchises Subscribe now for 2000 Microsoft® Points / 12 months*  Conditions and restrictions apply.  See WWW.EASPORTS.COM/SEASONTICKET
